Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Alright alright, go say hi to Copper and Booker down at the new station.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: We do have one more person who is interested in coming here.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: A gentleman by the name of Blathers wishes to build an entire museum!

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Not only can people see what is on display, but they will be able to make donations as well.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: I haven't been more excited for some more construction to take place. This is truly awesome.
